li.p: While the STS is still on the truck, inspect the equipment and shipping skids for any signs of damage or mishandling. If the system shows any damage, note it on the freight bill and file a damage claim with the carrier within 24 hours. Please contact Eaton Service (1-800-843-9433) if damage has occurred. Do not attempt to install the system if damage is apparent.
Locate the bag containing the keys for the front doors, which will be attached to the cabinet.
Verify that all units have been received.
Compare the contents of the shipment with the bill of lading. Report any missing items to the carrier and Eaton PDI immediately.
If you ordered spare parts, verify that they arrived.

If the unit is to be stored before installation, it should be stored in a dry environment within storage temperatures specified in . Use the original packing materials or other suitable means to keep the unit clean.
